power.title: Demoralizing Strike
power.fluff: The fury of your assault causes a surge of fear in your foe's heart

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to Will until the start of your next turn.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a penalty to all defenses until the start of your next turn. The penalty equals 1 + one-half your Constitution modifier (minimum -2 penalty).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target takes one-half the penalty to Will until the start of your next turn.

power.title: Energizing Strike
power.fluff: The energy and emotion you put into your attack flows into your ally

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: One ally within 5 squares of you gains temporary hit points. The temporary hit points equal your Charisma modifier, or one-half this amount if your attack missed.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 3 + your Charisma modifier temporary hit points.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 6 + your Charisma modifier temporary hit points.
The power gains the Healing keyword

section.name: Effect:
section.text: One dying ally within 5 squares of you regains hit points. The hit points regained equal your Charisma modifier, or one-half this amount if your attack was a miss.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 4 + your Charisma modifier hit points regained.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 8 + your Charisma modifier hit points regained.
The power gains the Healing keyword

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: One ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Focusing Strike
power.fluff: You attack your foe with calm and clarity of mind, extending that clarity to give a nearby ally a chance to clear a lingering effect

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You or one ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You or one ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end. If the effect has the Charm or Fear keyword, the saving throw gains a power bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You and each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end. If the effect has the Charm or Fear keyword, the saving throw gains a power bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Impetuos Ruin
power.fluff: Your strike hobbles your enemy's impulsiveness, preventing it from reacting in the heat of combat

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] damage, and the target cannot make opportunity attacks against creatures other than you until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] damage, and the target cannot take opportunity actions or immediate actions until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Intent Laid Bare
power.fluff: You slip into your opponent's mind while the pain from your attack distracts it

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can communicate with the target via telepathy 5 until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this power unaugmented as a melee basic attack.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you can communicate with the target via telepathy 5 and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls with attacks that include you as a target.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you can communicate with the target via telepathy 5, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls with attack that include you as a target, and if the target moves, either you or one ally within 5 squares of you can shift 1 square as a free reaction.

power.title: Ire Strike
power.fluff: You feel anger rising within you, and you empower a nearby ally to strike

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy, and one ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target ally can make a melee basic attack against the target enemy as a free reaction.
If the attack hits, the target has vulnerable 2 psychic until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target ally can make a melee basic attack against the target enemy as a free reaction.
If the attack hits, the target has vulnerable all until the end of your next turn. The vulnerable equals 1 + one-half your Constitution modifier (minimum vulnerable 2).

section.name: Close
section.text: burst 5

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy adjacent to you, and one ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target ally can use a free reaction to shift to a square adjacent to the target enemy, and then make a melee basic attack against it. The attack deals +1d8 extra damage.
If the attack hits, the target has vulnerable all until the end of your next turn. The vulnerable equals 3 + one-half your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Karmic Bond
power.fluff: Your strike ensures the enemy reaps what it sows by forming a bond between it and the creature it attacks next

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

If the target deals damage with an attack before the start of your next turn, it takes extra damage from the first attack that hits it before the end of your next turn. The extra damage equals your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

If the target deals damage with an attack before the start of your next turn, it takes extra damage from the first attack that hits it before the end of your following turn. The extra damage equals your Constitution modifier.

If the target succeeds on a saving throw before the start of your next turn, one ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw with a power bonus equal to one-half Wisdom modifier (minimum +1 bonus).

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

If the target deals damage with an attack before the start of your next turn, it takes extra damage from the each attack that hits it before the end of your following turn. The extra damage equals your Constitution modifier.

If the target succeeds on a saving throw before the start of your next turn, each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw with a power bonus equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier (minimum +1 bonus).
